title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to save humanity.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker in a psychological and physical battle for Gotham.

title: Toy Story
description: A story of toys that come to life when humans aren't around.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian descends into madness.

title: The Hangover
description: Three friends wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night.
